verses.verse: A soft <S%H7390><s%> answer <S%H4617><s%> turneth <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> away wrath <S%H2534><s%>: but grievous <S%H6089><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> stir up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> anger <S%H639><s%>.

The tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> useht knowledge <S%H1847><s%> aright <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> poureth out <S%H5042><s%> <S%H8686><s%> foolishness <S%H200><s%>.
The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> are in every place <S%H4725><s%>, beholding <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> and the good <S%H2896><s%>.
A wholesome <S%H4832><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> is a tree <S%H6086><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>: but perverseness <S%H5558><s%> therein is a breach <S%H7667><s%> in the spirit <S%H7307><s%>.

A fool <S%H191><s%> despiseht <S%H5006><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%>: but he that regardeth <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> is prudent <S%H6191><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

In the house <S%H1004><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is much <S%H7227><s%> treasure <S%H2633><s%>: but in the revenues <S%H8393><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is trouble <S%H5916><s%> <S%H8737><s%>.
The lips <S%H8193><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> disperse <S%H2219><s%> <S%H8762><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>: but the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the foolish <S%H3684><s%> doeth not so.

The sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%>: but the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> is his delight <S%H7522><s%>.

The way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>: but he loveth <S%H157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him that followeth <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8764><s%> after righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

Correction <S%H4148><s%> is grievous <S%H7451><s%> unto him that forsaketh <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the way <S%H734><s%>: and he that hateth <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
SH'ol <S%H7585><s%> and destruction <S%H11><s%> are before the YY <S%H3068><s%>: how much more then the hearts <S%H3826><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> ?

A scorner <S%H3887><s%> <S%H8801><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not one that reproveth <S%H3198><s%> <S%H8687><s%> him: neither will he go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the wise <S%H2450><s%>.

A merry <S%H8056><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> maketh a cheerful <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8686><s%> countenance <S%H6440><s%>: but by sorrow <S%H6094><s%> of the heart <S%H3820><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> is broken <S%H5218><s%>.

The heart <S%H3820><s%> of him that hath understanding <S%H995><s%> <S%H8737><s%> seeketh <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>: but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> feedeth <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on foolishness <S%H200><s%>.
All the days <S%H3117><s%> of the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> are evil <S%H7451><s%>: but he that is of a merry <S%H2896><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> hath a continual <S%H8548><s%> feast <S%H4960><s%>.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is little <S%H4592><s%> with the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> than great <S%H7227><s%> treasure <S%H214><s%> and trouble <S%H4103><s%> therewith.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is a dinner <S%H737><s%> of herbs <S%H3419><s%> where love <S%H160><s%> is, than a stalled <S%H75><s%> <S%H8803><s%> ox <S%H7794><s%> and hatred <S%H8135><s%> therewith.

A wrathful <S%H2534><s%> man <S%H376><s%> stirreth up <S%H1624><s%> <S%H8762><s%> strife <S%H4066><s%>: but he that is slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> appeaseht <S%H8252><s%> <S%H8686><s%> strife <S%H7379><s%>.

The way <S%H1870><s%> of the slothful <S%H6102><s%> man is as an hedge <S%H4881><s%> of tshofars <S%H2312><s%>: but the way <S%H734><s%> of the righteous <S%H3477><s%> is made plain <S%H5549><s%> <S%H8803><s%>.

A wise <S%H2450><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> maketh a glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8762><s%> father <S%H1><s%>: but a foolish <S%H3684><s%> man <S%H120><s%> despiseht <S%H959><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>.

Folly <S%H200><s%> is joy <S%H8057><s%> to him that is destitute <S%H2638><s%> of wisdom <S%H3820><s%>: but a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding <S%H8394><s%> walketh <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> uprightly <S%H3474><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

Without counsel <S%H5475><s%> purposes <S%H4284><s%> are disappointed <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8687><s%>: but in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of counsellors <S%H3289><s%> <S%H8802><s%> they are established <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
A man <S%H376><s%> hath joy <S%H8057><s%> by the answer <S%H4617><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>: and a word <S%H1697><s%> spoken in due season <S%H6256><s%>, how good <S%H2896><s%> is it !

The way <S%H734><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> is above <S%H4605><s%> to the wise <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, that he may depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from SH'ol <S%H7585><s%> beneath <S%H4295><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> will destroy <S%H5255><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the proud <S%H1343><s%>: but he will establish <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of the widow <S%H490><s%>.
The thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of the wicked <S%H7451><s%> are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%>: but the words of the pure <S%H2889><s%> are pleasant <S%H5278><s%> words <S%H561><s%>.

He that is greedy <S%H1214><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of gain <S%H1215><s%> troubleth <S%H5916><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his own house <S%H1004><s%>; but he that hateth <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> gifts <S%H4979><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> studieth <S%H1897><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> poureth <S%H5042><s%> <S%H8686><s%> out evil things <S%H7451><s%>.
The YY <S%H3068><s%> is far <S%H7350><s%> from the wicked <S%H7563><s%>: but he heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.

The light <S%H3974><s%> of the eyes <S%H5869><s%> rejoiceth <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%>: and a good <S%H2896><s%> report <S%H8052><s%> maketh <S%H1878><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> fat <S%H1878><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.
The ear <S%H241><s%> that heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the reproof <S%H8433><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> abideth <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the wise <S%H2450><s%>.

He that refuseht <S%H6544><s%> <S%H8802><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%> despiseht <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his own soul <S%H5315><s%>: but he that heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8802><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> getteth <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8802><s%> understanding <S%H3820><s%>.
The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> is the instruction <S%H4148><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%>; and before <S%H6440><s%> honour <S%H3519><s%> is humility <S%H6038><s%>.
